item.title: How to Collect UPS Data on pfSense with Telegraf
item.description: If you are running Grafana at home to monitor your devices, and you also have pfSense running off a UPS (if you don’t, check out my previous article on How to Setup a USB UPS on pfSense), you may want to pull UPS related data from pfSense. My Grafana pfSense config Instructions a. Start by logging into your pfSense, go into “System => Package Manager = Available Packages” and install Telegraf
